name: Granville Island Shopping Tour
description:
Not sure where to shop or where to start? Would you like to discover hidden gems where the locals shop? Ready for a shopping adventure? Join us on an exciting walking tour through Vancouver's best shopping neighborhoods.

Your Shopping Expert will take you off the beaten track to discover artisan studios, boutiques, and designer shops, restaurants, cafes and you'll *receive exclusive discounts along the way. There is always a chance you'll meet a designer or see an artist working or discover a great sale. Guaranteed, you will discover something new and have fun.

Explore our tours below or have us put together a customized private tour for you including Food + Drinks.

Prices are per person excluding tax. Advance bookings required and subject to availability. Min 2, max 8-10 people per tour guide. Additional days of the week are on request.
